Pre-Game Insights: The match between South Africa and Zimbabwe is part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Australia, 2022, and will be played at Bellerive Oval, Hobart on 24th October 2022 at 01:30 PM IST.
Zimbabwe has played 3 matches in the series and is currently in 4th place on the points table, while South Africa is playing its first match of the season.
The pitch at Bellerive Oval, Hobart is balanced, offering assistance to both batsmen and bowlers. The average first innings score in the last 16 matches at this venue is 150 runs.

In the last 5 matches between these two teams, Zimbabwe has not performed well against South Africa. South African batsmen have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while all-rounders have earned the most fantasy points for Zimbabwe.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match officials for the game are Umpires: Ahsan Raza, Michael Gough, Chris Gaffaney, and Referee: David Boon.
Fantasy tips suggest including more pacers in the team as they have been quite successful at this venue.
